entry.name: jQuery.mobile.path.getDocumentUrl
entry.title: jQuery.mobile.path.getDocumentUrl()
entry.desc: Utility method for retrieving the URL of the original document.

argument.name: asParsedObject
argument.desc: The function normally returns the original document's URL as a string. However, if you specify a truthy value for this parameter, the original document's URL will be returned in a hash as a parsed URL.
